name: Progress Bar UI Design
description:
Progress bars when used at the right places can act as great visual feedback. You can add these progress bars to any of your designs to improve the user experience.


Use cases include adding them to presentation slides, web forms, gallery images, brochures, ebooks, whitepapers and more.
